link.script:
{"url":"https://www.effectiveness.org","name":"Center for Educational Effectiveness","description":"
CEE provides survey, data analytics and consulting services to assist you in meeting the challenges that currently surround the many mandates for increased student achievement. Schools gain the necessary tools to conduct a deep analysis of student performance, stakeholder perception, and the effectiveness of current practices. Our user-friendly tools make it easy to identify areas of strength and areas of necessary change that lead to achievement-focused action.","image":"//static1.squarespace.com/static/57cf1310197aea734bbebfec/t/588631a8ebbd1ac25eec5f1f/1588181053374/","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"WebSite"}

div.h2: Click below to review the results of March 22-April 29.
Take the survey again for Week 6 (April 29-May 6).
Watch for updates on this conversation.

div.h1: Please share your perceptions about student learning while schools are closed. Be a part of our collective conversation to support education leaders and communities who are moving student learning forward. We’re in this together!

div.label:
Share your email to receive updates.
*

p.strong: Thank you. We will provide you with updates as they become available.

div.p: ﻿Our community and education leaders are doing their best to navigate the ever-changing landscape of the novel coronavirus disease (COVID-19). Your perceptions and sense of hope will provide feedback to inform conversations and support improvement efforts. Data will be collected and shared with school districts and the community on an ongoing basis to track changes in people's perceptions. Check back with us for more of this story.
Thank you for participating. You are invited to complete the survey once per week.

div.a: ARE YOU A DISTRICT ADMINISTRATOR? RECEIVE A FREE REPORT FOR YOUR DISTRICT.

div.h3: Follow this story on CEE’s Social Media Pages

div.p: CEE provides survey, data analytics and consulting services to assist you in meeting the challenges that currently surround the many mandates for increased student achievement. Schools gain the necessary tools to conduct a deep analysis of student performance, stakeholder perception, and the effectiveness of current practices. Our user-friendly tools make it easy to identify areas of strength and areas of necessary change that lead to achievement-focused action.
